#summary Contacts

= Django Adressbook Application =

This application (and the associated contact database) are supposed to be served by an apache webserver installation from within a Django framework. Contacts are accessible and synchronized from and with any authorized client on the network as well as via IrDA and Bluetooth.

If you use or like this software, please donate a Dollar/Euro via Paypal to mabo-technik@web.de

Thank you!
